member.name: ITfFnAdviseText.OnLatticeUpdate
member.summary: Called when a lattice element within a context changes.
member.param: Pointer to an object that represents the range of text that changed.
Pointer to an object that represents the new lattice element.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: ITfFnAdviseText.OnTextUpdate
member.summary: Called when the text within a context changes.
member.param: Pointer to an object that represents the range of text that has changed.
Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the new text for the range.
Specifies the number of characters contained in pchText.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfFnAdviseText interface is implemented by a text service and used by the TSF manager to supply notifications when the text or lattice element in a context changes.
The manager obtains this interface from the text service by calling the text service interface with IID_ITfFnAdviseText.
